ing: 8 ounces rotelle or spiral pasta, cooked and drained
2 1/2 cups assorted cut-up vegetables (broccoli, carrots, tomatoes, bell peppers, cauliflower, onions and mushrooms)
1/2 cup cubed Cheddar or mozzarella cheese
des: "Perfect for a buffet or a barbecue. Customize with your favorite vegetables."
ins: Combine all ingredients except Wish-Bone(R) Italian Dressing in large bowl. Add Dressing; toss well. Serve chilled or at room temperature.
